name: Start
text: Hello dear customer! How may I help you today?

name: positive1
text: Oh of course my dear! I would be glad to assist you, that would be 1 shilling.

name: negative2
text: Well, have I never! If you are so upset feel free to shop elsewhere. You are officially banned from this establishment! Get out of my shop!

name: banned
text: Guess that did not go too well...

name: positive2
text: Poor sweet child! Is there a reason why you are unable to afford such pleasures?

name: positive3
text: Well, you seem like an honest personâ€¦ I guess I shall allow it for 6 pence this time. But be sure not to spend your money all in one place! Money is hard to come by.

name: negative1
text: Well dear me! If you're in a rush, I can bag this up for you for 1 shilling and 6 pence.

name: negative3
text: Well, the price has just gone up to a shilling and 6 pence. If you have an issue with that, you may shop elsewhere.

name: positive4
text: Well? What is wrong child? Spit it out!

name: positive5
text: I guess I shall allow it for 1 shilling this time. But you better learn some manners next time you come around.
